pathAssistantSteps.info:
• Communication and interest has been established.
  • Having regular conversations.
  • Determine and build one or multiple Quotes.
  • Move Stage to "Negotiations" once the Quote is sent.

• One or more Quotes have been created and sent for review.
  • Quotes are being discussed and potentially updated and re-sent for review.
  • Push out the Close Date to align with assumed date of contract signature.
    • Close Date should always be in the future for open Opportunities.
  • Move to Closed Won when a contract is signed.
  • Move to Closed Lost when the negotiations don't move forward with a signed contract.
